name: BalanSphere
description:
Made in 72 hours for Mini Game Jam 34 : Balance

The limitation was : "2 button controls"

In BalanSphere, you control sphere (yes) which can morph from small to big or big to small. You will need to get across many obstacles by controlling your mass and your size while discovering new mechanics to play with.

Controls :

- Left or Right Arrow to move

- Left and Right Arrow at the same time to morph
